keyword: how many calories in coors light
title: How Many Calories in Coors Light?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in Coors Light for a standard 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown with tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in Coors Light?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle or can of Coors Light lager beer, chilled, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by serving size, regional formulation, and brewing batch. Check the label for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Coors Light contains 102 kcal and 5 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Coors Light with lime wedge (adds negligible calories)
Compared to regular Coors (higher carb version)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Coors Light bottle?
faqs.a: A standard 12 oz Coors Light has 102 calories.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Coors Light?
faqs.a: About 5 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Coors Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: It has 1 g protein and 0 g total fat per bottle.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Coors Light?
faqs.a: Approximately 10 mg of sodium per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: Are there calories in Coors Light compared to other light beers?
faqs.a: Coors Light is low at 102 kcal per 12 oz; similar to many light beers but varies by brand.
